benefits: ₹6,000 per year in three equal installments of ₹2,000.
application_steps: Register online at pmkisan.gov.in or via Common Service Centers (CSCs).
documents: Aadhaar Card, Land Ownership Papers, Bank Account Details.
notes: Institutional landholders are not eligible. eKYC is mandatory.

scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY) - Per Drop More Crop
eligibility: Farmers of all categories. Priority to small and marginal farmers.
benefits: Subsidy for drip/sprinkler irrigation systems. Small/Marginal farmers: 55% subsidy. Other farmers: 45% subsidy. Some states like Tamil Nadu provide up to 100% for small farmers.
application_steps: Apply via state horticulture department portal or MIMI portal.
documents: Land chitta/adangal, Aadhaar, Photo, Bank passbook, Quotation from registered vendor.
notes: GST is usually extra and borne by the farmer in some states.

eligibility: All farmers, tenant farmers, oral lessees, and SHGs.
benefits: Short-term crop loans at low interest (effective 4% if repaid timely). Credit limit based on crop scale of finance.
application_steps: Visit nearest bank branch or apply online via bank website.
documents: Land revenue records, Identity proof, Address proof.
notes: Interest subvention of 2% and Prompt Repayment Incentive of 3% available.

benefits: Soil testing report with fertilizer recommendations.
application_steps: Collect soil sample and submit to nearest Soil Testing Lab or Agriculture Office.
